biotools.summary: DynaVenn is a tool for creating Venn diagrams. It can be used to determine the most significant overlap between subsets of two or three sorted (gene) lists. This approach avoids the arbitrary selection of a fixed threshold for the length of the sets.

bioschemas.name: DynaVenn
